    BRANCH_CODE                VARCHAR(20),

) PRIMARY INDEX (TRANSACTION_ID);","executionOrder":1,"title":""},{"script":"CREATE TABLE CUSTOMER_BANK_TRANSACTIONS

    ACCOUNT_BALANCE      DECIMAL(18,2),
    BRANCH_CODE          VARCHAR(20),
    IS_FRAUD             INTEGER,
    CREDIT_SCORE         INTEGER,
    LOAN_STATUS          VARCHAR(20),
    LOAN_AMOUNT          DECIMAL(18,2),
    EMI_AMOUNT           DECIMAL(18,2),
    TENURE_MONTHS        INTEGER,
    INCOME               DECIMAL(18,2),
    EXPENSES             DECIMAL(18,2),
    AMOUNT_IN_USD        DECIMAL(18,2)
);
